store/availability-subscriber-custom.for: I want to know when this product becomes available
store/availability-subscriber-custom.bac: I consent to the processing of my personal data to allow Hotpoint Italia Srl to inform me by email when the product becomes available again on the site, the price of the product drops, and to send me a comparison table of selected products.
store/availability-subscriber-custom.opt: I consent to the processing of my personal data to allow Whirlpool Italia Srl to send me newsletters / marketing communications (in electronic and non-electronic form, also by telephone, traditional mail, e-mail, SMS, push notifications on third-party sites including on Facebook and Google platforms) regarding Whirlpool Italia Srl products and services, also purchased or registered by me, as well as to carry out market research.
store/availability-subscriber-custom.suc: Subscription to be notified when product come back in stock is successfull
Registration for product notification and newsletter subscription successful
store/availability-subscriber-custom.err: You are already registered to newsletter
Error subscription to Newsletter notification was unsuccessful
To change the flag of the newsletter section, you need to log in to your personal account.
